Minnetonka.Shoppes at Knollwood:
The Shoppes at Knollwood, previously known as Knollwood Mall, is a regional shopping mall located along Minnesota State Highway 7 in Saint Louis Park, Minnesota owned by Gateway Knollwood, LLC and managed by Mid-America Real Estate-Minnesota. Major stores at the mall include Kohl's, TJ Maxx, Old Navy, Nordstrom Rack, DSW Shoe Warehouse, and Cub Foods.


== History ==
Knollwood Mall opened in 1955 as an open-air strip mall called Knollwood Plaza.
